Title: Why we can’t give full approval for herbal medicines — NAFDAC DG
Summary: The National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) has said that herbal medicines will not get full approval without undergoing proper clinical trials . This was made known in a statement issued on Sunday, October 12, 2025, by the NAFDAC .

Title: Emmars falls in love with music for its klatch with fundamental laws of universe
Summary: Taiwo Emmanuel Adekánle is a Nigerian-born, Glasgow-based composer and performer . His genre-defying sound fuses traditional genres, rhythms, ambient electronics, and jazz improvisations into a genuinely distinct appeal .

Title: NEPC trains corps members in cosmetic production for export
Summary: The Nigerian Export Promotion Council (NEPC), South West Regional Office, in collaboration with Shea Origin, has empowered youth corps members with practical skills in cosmetics production and export opportunities . The sensitisation workshop, held in conjunction with Shea- Origin, was held in Nigeria's South West region .

Title: Four Nigerians remanded in Ghana for alleged house burglaries
Summary: Four Nigerians remanded in Ghana for alleged house burglaries . They are accused of breaking into residential apartments at Baatsonaa, a suburb of Accra . They allegedly stole valuables including cash, electronics, and a piggy bank .

Title: HURIWA questions Tinubu’s motive in appointing Amupitan as INEC chair
Summary: HURIWA questions Tinubu’s motive in appointing Amupitan as INEC chair . HURIwa alleges that the move is politically motivated . The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) has raised concerns over the appointment .

Title: NDLEA arrests businessman who excretes 127 cocaine wraps at Kano airport
Summary: Ejiofor, who operates boutiques in Lagos and Onitsha, Anambra state, was taken into NDLEA custody . The businessman excretes 127 cocaine wraps at Kano airport .

Title: CSO slams FIJ over alleged false corruption report
Summary: Niger Delta Rights Advocates, NDRA, express dismay over what it described as unethical reporting by Foundation for Investigative Journalism, FIJ . The group accused FIJ of promoting a one-sided story that allegedly maligned a public servant .

Title: Insecurity: Service chiefs must be more ruthless with terrorists – APC chieftain
Summary: A Chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Osun, has urged the service chiefs to be more ruthless with terrorists killing innocent citizens .

Title: China accuses US of ‘double standards’ over new tariffs threat
Summary: China accuses the United States of "double standards" over new tariffs threat . President Donald Trump announced an additional 100 percent tariff on the world's second-largest economy .

Title: FIFA U-20 World Cup: 2 countries qualify for semi-final
Summary: Two countries have booked their places in the semi-final of the ongoing FIFA U-20 World Cup in Chile . The teams are currently competing in the tournament .
